lead_paragraph: The audience for Sunday night’s bout between Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump fell sharply from their first debate.

headline.print_headline: Despite Buildup, Ratings for Debate Take a Nosedive
headline.main: Ratings for Second Debate Dive 20 Percent

snippet: The audience for Sunday night’s bout between Hillary Clinton and Donald J. Trump fell sharply from their first debate....
abstract: Nielsen reports about 66.5 million people watched second presidential debate between Hillary Clinton and Donald J Trump, down 20 percent from record 84 million viewing first debate.
